measure_description: The measured device fw: 1.4.4, Eco Mode enabled, Wifi Client enabled, WiFi AP disabled, BlueTooth disabled. The result represents the average value of measurements collected from the measurement device API for the following scenarios: dumb device/baseline consumption (~4.9W), all relays turned off, one relay turned on
name: Shelly Plus 2PM
author: Michal Bartak <maxym.srpl@gmail.com>
